enum SolarizedLightColorTheme: string;
See also: http://ethanschoonover.com/solarized

class Viz;

@trusted void ppRaw(T...)(T args);
Put to without any conversion nor coloring.

@trusted void pplnRaw(T...)(T args);
Put to without any conversion nor coloring.

@trusted void ppPut(T)(T arg, bool nbsp = true);
Put to possibly with conversion.

@trusted void ppPut(T)(Face!Color face, T arg, bool nbsp = true);
Put to possibly with conversion.

@trusted void pp1(Arg)(int depth, Arg arg);
Pretty-Print Single Argument to Terminal .

@trusted void ppN(Args...)(Args args);
Pretty-Print Multiple Arguments to Terminal .

@trusted void pp(Args...)(Args args);
Pretty-Print Arguments to Terminal without Line Termination.

@trusted void ppln(Args...)(Args args);
Pretty-Print Arguments including final line termination.

@trusted void pplns(Args...)(Args args);
Pretty-Print Arguments each including a final line termination.

@trusted void ppendl();
Print End of Line to Terminal .

enum MapResult!(__lambda65, Face!(Color)[]) keyFaces;
Key (Hit) Faces.

struct Fazed(T);
